remarks: Lemma for ~ jm2.19 .  Extend to ZZ by symmetry.  TODO: use ~ zindbi . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Sep-2014.)
statement: jm2.19lem4 $p |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) /\ I e. ZZ ) -> ( ( A rmY M ) || ( A rmY N ) <-> ( A rmY M ) || ( A rmY ( N + ( I x. M ) ) ) ) ) $.
